content:
PostHoc Summary

    + Learns rules consistent with known causal mechanisms more quickly than those not consistent


    + Uses existing knowledge to focus on features consistent with prior knowledge

    + Can learn with incomplete knowledge

      Complete:
        (easier (strong-actor) (inflate balloon))

        (easier (less-elastic) (inflate balloon))
      Incomplete
        (easier (strong-actor) (inflate balloon))
